Text:
Thank you!
This rip has 2 audio tracks, with Spanish as the first. You need the VLC player or equivalent to switch to audio track 2 if you want original English.
http://www.videolan.org/
Subtitles are not in English as stated above, but in Russian (Cyrillic alphabet).

Wow, weird. I did this with Format Factory and chose English audio & subs. When I play this file on my computer with VLC player, I have English audio & subs. Busy now but I'll take a closer look next week.

Anyone else not having English audio/subs? (I'm new to this so I might have done something wrong.)

BTW, there is another torrent with Spanish as 1st track and Russian subs, here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3395767/bliss.1997.lance.young.xvid.fzb

Maybe that's what you're referring to.
Sorry about that, please disregard my comment. I had confused this torrent with another one.
